    • Method Detail

      • getSpeed

        public double getSpeed(double v_n_t,
                       double V_n,
                       org.locationtech.jts.geom.Coordinate x_n_1_t,
                       double v_n_1_t,
                       double s_n_1,
                       double b_n_1,
                       org.locationtech.jts.geom.Coordinate x_n_t)
        Compute speed with steering behavior by using minimum between acceleration and braking
        Parameters:
        v_n_t - speed of vehicle n at time t
        V_n - speed at which the driver of vehicle n wishes to travel
        x_n_1_t - location of the front vehicle n-1 at time t
        v_n_1_t - speed of vehicle n-1 at time t
        s_n_1 - effective size of vehicle n-1
        b_n_1 - assumption of most severe braking of vehicle n-1
        x_n_t - location of the front of vehicle n at time t
        Returns:
        new speed for vehicle n

      • getSpeedWithoutLeader

        Compute speed without considering any leader.
        Parameters:
        v_n_t - speed of vehicle n at time t
        V_n - speed at which the driver of vehicle n wishes to travel
        Returns:
